definition: to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: A handy cam icon is displayed on slides generated using FMR.
sentences.chinese: 使用FMR产生的幻灯片，会显示手持摄像机图标。

sentences.english: Side mirrors are replaced by external cameras, located above the rear fenders .
sentences.chinese: 一面镜子取代外部摄像机，上方后方垫。

sentences.english: The three-axis lens mount allows for either wall or ceiling installation.
sentences.chinese: 三轴镜头支架能让摄像机安装在墙上或者天花板上。

sentences.english: Corner detection is the main task of the image processing in camera calibration.
sentences.chinese: 特征角点的提取是摄像机定标中图像处理的主要任务。

sentences.english: It can record any sound that's within about 8 feet of the camera.
sentences.chinese: 距离摄像机8英尺以内的声音都能收进去。

sentences.english: He summoned up a sickly smile for camera .
sentences.chinese: 他强打精神对摄像机苦笑一下。

sentences.english: The system structure and functional partition of the bi-camera system are presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了双摄像机系统的组成以及功能划分。

sentences.english: Observe the wide angle of the camera and the final geometry.
sentences.chinese: 观察广角摄像机以及最终的几何图形。

sentences.english: He said four camcorders had recorded the ignition process and firework display.
sentences.chinese: 他还提到四个摄像机拍到了烟花散开及起火的过程。

sentences.english: "Any of them real?" Langdon asked, motioning to the cameras.
sentences.chinese: “有真的吗？”兰登边问边指向摄像机。

sentences.english: The posturing before the camera on bothe sides repelled me.
sentences.chinese: 双方在摄像机前装腔作势的姿态令我作呕。

sentences.english: After recording their behavior with two video cameras aiming down on an insect-size stage, she analyzed 300 hours of videotape of the ants in action.
sentences.chinese: 之后，她用两部摄像机对准蚁巢来记录它们的行为。

sentences.english: The camera had been taking a photo every minute as part of a year-long project.
sentences.chinese: 去年，最初医生拒绝了他将摄像机植入头部的请求。

sentences.english: The posturing before the camera on both sides repelled me.
sentences.chinese: 双方在摄像机前装腔作势的姿态令我作呕。

sentences.english: The final part of the initialization code is the camera setup.
sentences.chinese: 初始化代码的最后一部分就是摄像机设置。

sentences.english: In this paper, a linear camera self-calibration technique based on projective reconstruction is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于射影重建的线性摄像机自标定方法。

definition: camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
to document on film the course of events/to follow sb with a camera
to take a picture of a person without permission or without their knowledge
